summary: Erica mentions in a TV interview, that her next book's about her friend, Peter, who vanished when they were 13. Shortly after, Peter's brother gets murdered. Erica and her cop husband investigate separately.
cast: Claudia Galli|Richard Ulfsäter|Eva Fritjofson|Pamela Cortes Bruna|Lennart Jähkel|Ann Westin|Ellen Stenman Göransson|Simon Brodén|Lukas Brodén|Måns Nathanaelson|Fredrik Hallgren|Meliz Karlge|Lisa Linnertorp|Marie Robertson|Anders Nordahl|Sten Ljunggren|Miran Kamala|Mikael Brolin|Tobias Aspelin|Petter Ljunggren|Petrus Havrell Nilsson|Felix Rehnquist|Lukas Berntsson|Kimberly Akvidson|Astrid Westling|Andreas Forsgren|Gabriella Enocsson|Märta Jungerfelt|Lotta Bouvin-Sundberg|Stefan Cronwall|Måns Ellmark
keywords: younger version of character|murder|part of series|based on character from novel|past and present
title: Los crímenes de Fjällbacka: Amigos hasta la muerte
